alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 7:41PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations up to 5 inches below 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 MPH. * WHERE...North Laramie Range and Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains. * WHEN...From Midnight Tonight to Midnight MDT Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County
